::DevilDuer/Zardus::

DevilDuer shruggs. "Guess so," he says, his eyes widening as he exits 
the base to look at the huge beast there. He slowly walks up to 
Zardus. "I'm guessing ya want me to stun that thing, boss?"

Zardus nods, "Is your gun charged enough to take out something that 
big?"

DevilDuer shruggs. "I think so. One way to find out."

He aims his gun at Rage's neck, firing a large beam from his stun gun.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Jonathan Hogan" <jhogan@r...> wrote:
> {Scorpina}
> 
>     Nodding Scorpina followed, "So why the weapon, expecting a 
fight when we
> get there?" Her own hands flexed opening up the claws of her beast 
mode that
> served as a bair of arm bracers in her robot form, small missiles 
can be
> seen on the inside of them..."If there's a fight, I'm ready!"
